nodes.text: The Ciutric sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories. In 19 BBY, it hosted the newly proclaimed Galactic Empire's Ciutric Offensive for to eradicate vestigial Confederacy of Independent Systems forces.
During the Yuuzhan Vong War, Mandalorian Tiroc Vhon escorted the Jedi Knight Kubariet out of the sector after rescuing him during the Yuuzhan Vong attack on New Holgha.
